name: Boulders
description:
Boulders is a narrative experience where you will explore a decadent world inhabited by beetles. In this game, inventory management is  key to your survival.

Credits:
  • Game Design: Saúl Parra Gutiérrez
  • Programming: Roberto Abad Jiménez
  • Environment art: Marta de la Vega Lobo
  • Character art & animation: Alba Borrego Fernández
